docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description Record One row / entity within the database Demographics Basic participant demographics summary DOI A DOI is a permanent reference with metadata about a digital object Investigator An individual who made contributions to the collection, analysis, or sharing ... Publication Information about a specific publication Study Study Metadata Subject This entity is the subject about which data or references are recorded SubjectAssertion Assertion about a particular Subject VirtualBiorepository An organization that can provide access to specimen for further analysis

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description acknowledgments Funding statement and acknowledgments for this study actual_number_of_participants Total participants included at this time age_at_assertion The age in days of the Subject when the assertion was made age_at_event The age in days of the Subject at the time point which the assertion describe... age_at_first_engagement Age in days of Participant at first recorded study event (enrollment, visit, ... age_at_last_vital_status Age in days when participant's vital status was last recorded age_at_resolution The age in days of the Subject when the asserted state was resolved assertion_id INLCUDE Global ID for the Assertion assertion_provenance The original source of this assertion bibliographic_reference Text use to reference this Record citation_statement Statement that secondary data users should use to acknowledge use of this stu... clinical_data_source_type Source(s) of data collected from study participants code The structured term defining the meaning of the assertion code_source The source text yielding the code contact The individual to contact with questions about this record data_category General category of data in this Record (e display The friendly display string of the coded term doi Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for this Record down_syndrome_status Down Syndrome status of participant email An email address to reach the entity ethnicity Ethnicity of Participant expected_number_of_participants Total expected number of participants to be recruited external_id Other identifiers for this entity, eg, from the submitting study or in system... funding_source The funding source(s) of the study id INLCUDE Global ID for this record institution Name of the institution this record is associated with invesitgator_title The title of the Investigator, eg, "Assistant Professor" name Name of the entity organism_type Organism Type parent_study The parent study for this study, if it is a nested study participant_lifespan_stage Focus age group(s) of the study population principal_investigator The Principal Investigator(s) responsible for the study program Funding source(s) for the study publication Publications associated with this Record race Race of Participant research_domain Main research domain(s) of the study, other than Down syndrome selection_criteria Brief description of inclusion and/or exclusion criteria for the study sex Sex of Participant study_code Unique identifier for the study (generally a short acronym) study_description Brief description of the study (2-4 sentences) study_design Overall design of study, including whether it is longitudinal and whether fam... study_id INLCUDE Global ID for the study study_short_name Short name for the study study_title Full Study Title subject_id INLCUDE Global ID for the Subject subject_type Type of entity this record represents uuid Internally assigned UUID for data management and QC purposes value_code The structured term defining the value of the assertion value_display The friendly display string of the coded term for the value of the assertion value_number The numeric value of the assertion value_source The source text yielding the value value_units The structured term defining the units of the value value_units_display The friendly display string of units of the value value_units_source The source text yielding the value's units vbr Information about the study's Virtual Biorepository, if participating vbr_readme Instructions for contacting or requesting samples from Virtual Biorepository,... vital_status Whether participant is alive or dead website Website for the Record
